name: Belfry Blitz
description:
Belfry Blitz challenges you to jump, dash, and grapple your way to the top of 7 unique vertical levels as fast as possible. Compete for the top spots on the in-game leaderboard, or try your luck at the optional challenge in each stage.

Movement: WASD
Jump: Spacebar
Grapple: Left mouse
Dash: Right mouse
Reset: R

Progress is saved automatically as long as cookies aren't blocked/disabled.
